_source.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
_source.long_desc: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.
_source.pricing_details:
Airtable offers 4 pricing plans.

Free: $0 per user/month for 1,200 records/base, 2GB attachment space/base & 2 weeks of revision & snapshot history
Plus: $12 per user/month for 5,000 records/base, 5GB attachment space/base & 6 months of revision & snapshot history
Pro: $24 per user/month for 50,000 records/base, 20GB attachment space/base & 1 year of revisions & snapshot history
Enterprise: To receive an accurate quote, contact Airtable directly.

Airtable also provides special plans for nonprofit and education organizations.
_source.target_audience: Small business and teams within larger organizations

related_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
related_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_products.short_desc: GCP offers wide range of managed database services across relational and non-relational workloads.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform offers wide range of managed database services across relational and non-relational workloads. Cloud Spanner is the only enterprise-grade, globally-distributed, and strongly-consistent database service built for the cloud specifically to combine the benefits of relational database structure with non-relational horizontal scale.

related_products.short_desc: Leading enterprise-grade relational database that offers secure data management and transaction processing.
related_products.features: Leading enterprise-grade relational database that offers secure data management and transaction processing.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage & share your data in Quickbase. Create a custom database today. Free 30-Day trial!
related_products.features: Used by over 80% of the Fortune 50, Quickbase is the fastest, easiest and most flexible way for growing companies to create and manage data, regardless of  location or industry. Quickbase is a web-based platform from which workgroups can easily create unlimited customizable applications to control data processes and improve productivity.  Easily import your existing data and spreadsheets, enabling instant mobile access to all your data for your entire team.  Free 30 Day Trial!

related_products.short_desc: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a database, including Aurora, MySQL, PostgreSQL
related_products.features: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) allows users to set up, operate, and scale a database in the cloud. Amazon RDS provides cost-efficient and resizable capacity while automating time-consuming administration tasks such as hardware provisioning, setup, patching, and backups. It frees you to focus on applications so you can give them the performance and security they need. Available Amazon RDS database engines: Amazon Aurora, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, Oracle Database, and SQL Server.

related_products.short_desc: Claris FileMaker - The award-winning database. Create stunning databases that work exactly the way you want that run on every device.
related_products.features: Join the 50,000+ companies that trust Claris FileMaker to create stunning database solutions. With drag-and-drop simplicity and built-in templates, you can create custom solutions to manage contacts, track inventory, organize projects, and improve collaboration. FileMaker apps integrate with other platforms to help you build a complete database management system. Get a 45-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Caspio is the world's leading LOW-CODE platform for building online database applications without having to write code.
related_products.features: Caspio is the world's leading LOW-CODE platform for building online database applications without coding. The all-in-one platform provides everything you need to digitally transform business operations and workflows. It includes an integrated cloud database, a visual application builder, enterprise-grade security, regulatory compliance, and scalable global infrastructure. See why Caspio is trusted by over 15,000 companies worldwide. Try it for FREE.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho Creator is an online database management software to build powerful web and mobile-ready applications.
related_products.features:
Zoho Creator is a powerful online database software to  build applications that collect and organize business data in real time. No programming skills required. Do a 'smart Import' of your data from offline sources (like Excel and MS-Access) and make them available online without worrying about IT-related challenges like maintenance, hosting, and scalability. 

Currently, 13,000+ customers have built 6M applications on Zoho Creator, a testimony to the power of the platform

related_products.short_desc: Secure and resizable compute capacity in the cloud. Launch applications when needed without upfront commitments.
related_products.features: Amazon EC2 presents a true virtual computing environment, allowing you to use web service interfaces to launch instances with a variety of operating systems, load them with your custom application environment, manage your network's access permissions, and run your image using as many or few systems as you desire.

related_products.short_desc: Your Business Data OS: Collect, organize & understand your data.
related_products.features: Formaloo is the all-in-one collaboration platform that enables you to build beautiful forms, access-controlled databases, and highly customizable business apps without any code - all in one place. Start now, go live today! Happy formaloo-ing!

similar_products.short_desc: Think about it. Build it. Kintone's visual application builder lets you create and customize your own agile, cloud-based databases.
similar_products.features: Spreadsheets are so last century. Kintone's visual application builder lets you convert your inefficient, static spreadsheets into dynamic, custom databases in a snap, zero coding required. As live databases, your data can do so much more, from creating custom reports with one click to triggering action-packed workflows that improve team collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily manage & share your data in Quickbase. Create a custom database today. Free 30-Day trial!
similar_products.features: Used by over 80% of the Fortune 50, Quickbase is the fastest, easiest and most flexible way for growing companies to create and manage data, regardless of  location or industry. Quickbase is a web-based platform from which workgroups can easily create unlimited customizable applications to control data processes and improve productivity.  Easily import your existing data and spreadsheets, enabling instant mobile access to all your data for your entire team.  Free 30 Day Trial!

similar_products.short_desc: MariaDB is the database for all, supporting any workload, in any cloud, at any scale.
similar_products.features: MariaDB is the database for all, supporting any workload, in any cloud, at any scale. It has the versatility to support transactional, analytical & hybrid workloads as well as relational, JSON & hybrid data models. MariaDB scales from standalone databases & data warehouses to fully distributed SQL for executing millions of TPS & performing interactive, ad hoc analytics on billions of rows. Deploy MariaDB on commodity hardware, on all major public clouds & through MariaDB SkySQL DBaaS.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Creator is an online database management software to build powerful web and mobile-ready applications.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Creator is a powerful online database software to  build applications that collect and organize business data in real time. No programming skills required. Do a 'smart Import' of your data from offline sources (like Excel and MS-Access) and make them available online without worrying about IT-related challenges like maintenance, hosting, and scalability. 

Currently, 13,000+ customers have built 6M applications on Zoho Creator, a testimony to the power of the platform

similar_products.short_desc: Caspio is the world's leading LOW-CODE platform for building online database applications without having to write code.
similar_products.features: Caspio is the world's leading LOW-CODE platform for building online database applications without coding. The all-in-one platform provides everything you need to digitally transform business operations and workflows. It includes an integrated cloud database, a visual application builder, enterprise-grade security, regulatory compliance, and scalable global infrastructure. See why Caspio is trusted by over 15,000 companies worldwide. Try it for FREE.

similar_products.short_desc:
A cloud built for developers. Powerful & scalable.
Quickly and easily spin up a high-performance database cluster.
similar_products.features: Worry-free database hosting. Leave the complexity of database administration to us. We'll handle setting up, backing up, and updating - so you can focus on building great apps.

similar_products.short_desc: Raima provides superior embedded and in-memory database solutions adding unique value across a broad range of applications.
similar_products.features:
Raima Database Manager (RDM) is an embedded c/c++ database developed for the IoT and edge market. 

Raima Database Manager is: 
- Small-footprint
- Cross-platform 
- In-memory or on-disk
- Optimized for performance
- Reliable for your mission-critical data

Fortune 500 companies in Aerospace & Defense, Automotive, Industrial Automation, and Healthcare trust Raima to deliver high-performance database products.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 most trusted no-code builder platform to securely drag-and-drop your way to custom web/mobile apps that track anything.
similar_products.features: TrackVia is the #1 most trusted low-code / no-code app building platform used by IT and business professionals to transform manual or spreadsheet-driven processes into streamlined web and mobile apps. Drag-and-drop your way to automated workflows, online databases, real-time reporting, and project tracking for literally anything. It's fast, simple, integrates with everything, and scales with your business.

similar_products.short_desc: Your Business Data OS: Collect, organize & understand your data.
similar_products.features: Formaloo is the all-in-one collaboration platform that enables you to build beautiful forms, access-controlled databases, and highly customizable business apps without any code - all in one place. Start now, go live today! Happy formaloo-ing!

similar_products.short_desc: Knack empowers everyday innovators to create custom, no-code apps that harness data, automate processes and move workflows online.
similar_products.features: Knack is a no-code development platform that anyone can use to create custom, data-centric apps. Build a CRM/Lead Manager, Membership Directory, Project Manager, Inventory Manager, Quote/Order Manager or HIPAA compliant app! Features include workflow rules, user permissions, email alerts, forms with logic, images, and file storage. Embed any app in your website for a branded experience. Built for desktop and mobile!

similar_products.short_desc: Build your application on the fastest and most scalable distributed streaming platform with Instaclustrs Apache Kafka.
similar_products.features:
Delivered by experts with over 30 million node hours under management coupled with 24*7 dedicated support. Instaclustr Managed Apache Kafka solution is SOC2 certified and comes with the flexibility of RIYOA or RIOA.

Instaclustr delivers reliability-at-scale 24*7*365 through an integrated data platform of open source technologies such as Apache Cassandra, Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, and Elasticsearch.

Supports add-ons like Zeppelin, Lucene, Kibana and more.

similar_products.short_desc: JetBrains DataGrip is an IDE for working with SQL and a variety of databases in one tool.
similar_products.features: JetBrains DataGrip is a powerful IDE for working with databases and SQL. It is designed to help you write and save queries; work with stored procedures; view, import, and export data; and perform the work you need to do with databases, all in one tool. It supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, MongoDB, and many other databases and DDL data sources. DataGrip also helps you code faster with its smart coding assistance, on-the-fly analysis and quick-fixes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Center Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Center Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Center Management software allows users to monitor and control all connected networks and devices across an entire organization. This type of software allows for application delivery, trouble shooting, and reporting across the organizational network. Data Center Management software is related to IT Asset Management software, Data Storage software, Database Management software, Network Monitoring software, and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Entry software eliminates tedious and labor-intensive manual data entry by providing tools for automatic data extraction, verification, and transfer into a system database. Data Entry software is an essential part of Forms Automation software and Document Management software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.name: Free
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's free plan is for individuals or very small teams just getting started.

pricing_plans.name: Plus
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Plus plan is for teams looking to create a single source of truth to manage their workflows and processes. It costs $12/seat/month when billed monthly or $10/seat/month when billed annually.

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Pro plan is for teams and companies who need to create workflows & apps to run their most important processes. It costs $24/seat/month when billed monthly or $20/seat/month when billed annually.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Enterprise plan is for departments and organizations who have advanced customization, scale, security, control and support needs.

_source.short_desc: Airtable combines an intuitive spreadsheet interface with file attachments, kanban boards, calendars, and other powerful features.
_source.long_desc: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.
_source.pricing_details:
Airtable offers 4 pricing plans.

Free: $0 per user/month for 1,200 records/base, 2GB attachment space/base & 2 weeks of revision & snapshot history
Plus: $12 per user/month for 5,000 records/base, 5GB attachment space/base & 6 months of revision & snapshot history
Pro: $24 per user/month for 50,000 records/base, 20GB attachment space/base & 1 year of revisions & snapshot history
Enterprise: To receive an accurate quote, contact Airtable directly.

Airtable also provides special plans for nonprofit and education organizations.
_source.target_audience: Small business and teams within larger organizations

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
related_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

related_products.short_desc: HubSpot CRM has everything you need to organize, track, and build better relationships with leads and customers.
related_products.features: Whether you've got a small team of five or a sophisticated sales force of 500, HubSpot offers pricing and packaging options that grow with you. HubSpot customer relationship management (CRM) software is built for companies that want to spend less time logging data. It keeps all your contacts in one centralized, customizable database. And you can see everything about a lead in one place -- no more digging through inboxes to find information. Start using the free HubSpot CRM today.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
related_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: ActiveCampaign CRM helps you sell more in less time by combining automated lead prioritization, task creation, and contact management.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign's CRM combines contact organization with sales automation, helping you sell more in less time. Prioritize your leads, keep track of your tasks, and automate contact management so nothing falls through the cracks. See your whole sales process at a glance and track every interaction, keeping your team on the same page. Features like lead scoring, win probability, and automated segmentation combined with marketing automation turns your team into a well-oiled, deal-closing machine.

related_products.short_desc:
The smarter way for small businesses to do great work
Keap organizes your client information & daily work in one place, freeing you up
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Run your business your way with a fully integrated CRM for small to medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Stay organized as you scale and grow. Finally, a CRM that?s easy to use, fully customizable and puts you in control of how you manage your leads, customers, tasks, team, projects, marketing and more. Create your free account to start customizing your CRM today.

similar_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
similar_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals.
similar_products.features: Zendesk Sell is sales CRM software that helps you close more deals. This sales platform tracks all your customer interactions in one unified interface. It's quick to implement and easy to use: 70% of companies are able to get Sell up and running in 7 days or less. Your teams will be able to focus on selling not admin work and can spend less time on data entry. 80% of customers agree that Zendesk has made their teams more efficient.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
similar_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite CRM+ delivers your business with powerful front-office capabilities in a single, cloud-based CRM solution.
similar_products.features: NetSuites CRM+ is a complete, front-office solution that unlocks a real-time, 360-degree view of your customers. CRM+ seamlessly integrates your customer-focused activities with accounting, e-commerce, warehousing and shipping applications to support your entire sales process and customer life cycle starting from a lead, and progressing through opportunity, sales order, fulfillment, renewal, upsell, cross-sell and support.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with flexible CRM that matches your sales process exactly.
similar_products.features: Improve your team's accountability and productivity with a flexible CRM that matches your complex sales process exactly. Track tasks, leads, and opportunities in real time. Built-in mobile forms and workflows keep everything moving, trigger-based actions make your team more productive, and automated reporting keeps your stakeholders in the know. Find out why over 80% of the Fortune 50 trusts Quickbase.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution built on an omnichannel platform.
similar_products.features: Zoho CRM empowers SMBs & enterprises with a 360? customer relationship lifecycle management solution. Key features include contact management, sales funnels, pipeline management, workflow automation, AI-powered conversational assistant, task management, managing marketing campaigns, sales forecasting, customer support & service, inventory management, reporting & analytics, and seamlessly integrate with 500+ popular business apps in a single business system.

similar_products.short_desc: Pipedrive is an easy to implement CRM software tool that helps you focus on the activities that drive deals to close.
similar_products.features: Pipedrive is a sales-focused customer relationship management tool that teams of all sizes love using. With 100'000+ paying customers spanning across 179 countries, sales teams are drawn in by our CRMs simple yet powerful design that prioritizes usability above all else. When using Pipedrive, nothing falls through the cracks, allowing your team to spend less time filing and more time selling with a CRM software that is both agile and powerful.

Premium Cloud), or, you can leverage a hybrid deployment for maximum flexibility!

similar_products.short_desc: TigerLRM is an all-in-one Sales Enablement Software with tools for Content Management, Training & Coaching, In-Built CRM, and more.

Bring out the Tiger in your sales team with a highly intuitive, easy-to-use suite of Sales Enablement and CRM tools that help sales professionals focus on hunting and closing leads. TigerLRM comes fully equipped with built-in features and tools that cut down on sales guesswork and presumptions.

similar_products.short_desc:

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

similar_products.short_desc: monday sales CRM empowers sales teams to manage every aspect of their sales cycle and customer data in one centralized place.
similar_products.features: Perfect for small-medium businesses, monday sales CRM is a no-code fully-customizable CRM built on top of monday.com Work OS. Dubbed the CRM without the frustration, it handles all sales processes and client communication in one place. From capturing leads, managing contact info, tracking deals or collaborating across departments, monday sales CRM lets you manage it all. You can use built-in automations or easily create your own to streamline any manual work so you can focus more time on sales.

VipeCloud is the Sales CRM with Marketing Suite that builds rapport with you. Our All-In-One solution includes CRM, Email Marketing, Social Posting, Texting, Video Email, Integrations, and More.

With VipeCloud's single solution + rapport building, your business will increase efficiency and accelerate growth. It's no surprise 99% of customers rate our support at 4+ stars.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Lead Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Lead Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Lead Management software enables the forecasting, collection and tracking of sales leads. Through the use of Lead Management solutions, organizations can automate and manage their prospect database as well as share and distribute leads throughout the enterprise. Organizations can also use Lead Management tools to track the progress of leads, analyze the performance of sales staff and marketing campaigns and develop new leads from their existing customer base. Lead Management software is related to Contact Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Force Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Force Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Force Automation software manages an organization's sales force functions which can include: lead management, customer account management, contact management, quote management, forecasting, customer demographics and employee performance management. Sales Force Automation applications improve sales productivity while providing a method of distribution for sales analytics throughout an enterprise. Sales Force Automation software is related to Commission software, Contact Management software, Lead Management software and Quoting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Tracking software enables businesses and sales teams to monitor pipelines, manage steps in the sales process, and track key performance numbers.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

pricing_plans.name: Free
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's free plan is for individuals or very small teams just getting started.

pricing_plans.name: Plus
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Plus plan is for teams looking to create a single source of truth to manage their workflows and processes. It costs $12/seat/month when billed monthly or $10/seat/month when billed annually.

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Pro plan is for teams and companies who need to create workflows & apps to run their most important processes. It costs $24/seat/month when billed monthly or $20/seat/month when billed annually.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: Airtable's Enterprise plan is for departments and organizations who have advanced customization, scale, security, control and support needs.
